Eu comprei um pc novo s√≥ pra jogar esse game. Simplesmente incrivel a premissa de sobrevivente vs Killers. Unica coisa que acho meio ruim √© a falta de servidores compartilhados, Demora demais para achar uma partida no game chega ate a 15 minutos pra achar uma partida, e isso √© ruim, Eu acho que deveriam focar em servidores compartilhados por exemplo como √© no Battlefield que tem varias nacionalidades na mesma partida
o jogo √© excelente para se jogar com os amigos

A ideia do jogo √© √≥tima, tem boa hist√≥ria e personagens carism√°ticos com belos backgrounds. Mas na execu√ß√£o do game em si √© bem falho. Os assassinos s√£o os que deviam aterrorizar o jogo, mas √© bem ao contr√°rio. Sobreviventes de ranks mais altos sempre v√£o te zoar por algum erro bobo teu ou quando voc√™ n√£o consegue peg√°-los na persegui√ß√£o. O jogo n√£o √© equilibrado, ele √© TOTAL voltado para sobreviventes, ou seja, quer jogar de assassino, ent√£o prepare-se pra ficar estressado em todo jogo. Os mapas beneficiam sobreviventes, o objetivo deles √© f√°cil e tamb√©m tem a vantagem n√∫merica, mas isso √© o de menos. Voc√™ como assassino tem que fazer um monte de coisa pra conseguir matar algu√©m, s√£o 3 enganchadas pra matar, e isso leva MUITO tempo levando em conta que sempre v√£o salvar o amiguinho ou ficar trocando de alvo pra te atrasar mais e mais.

Sinceramente, talvez se fossem menos ganchos pra matar sobreviventes ou algo assim, o jogo seria mais tranquilo pra qm joga de assassino. Mas enfim, isso √© s√≥ mais uma opini√£o como tantas outras por a√≠.

ok look, this is a very good game. Their really isnt anything wrong with it, exsept for one thing. if your reading this review, then your probobly wanting to get into the game, but look, this game isnt very friendly to new comers, and it honestly pisses me off. The way the whole ranking system works is just so bs, and i cant recomend it to new players at all. basicly, how the ranking works is you can be in rank 20-1, 1 being the best and 20 being the lowest, however, your rank determens what games you get in, so if i was rank 15, i would get games with others that are rank 15. seems fair right, wrong. yuour rank gets reset every so often, meaning that you can get a veteren god gamer killer/survivor while your just started playing. not to mention that those vets will have perks that are just outright better than yours, seeing their killer/survivor is going to be higher level than you. so your just going to be in this loop were you cant improve because you keep getting curbstomped by good players.  now, im not saying the game is bad becauses of this, im saying that its going to take a l o n g time for new accounts to get the hang of the game. ive just switched from xbox to pc, and its honestly bullcrap that almost every game i get people with way better everything than i do. i hope this gets fixed cus this aint it chef
ive got right at 400 hours into this game and there putting me against people that have 4000 and its not fair at all

I'm warning you... 
this game is a desperate addiction; 
YES; most of the time it is really delightful to play both sides,
also the graphics and gameplay experience are really satisfying,
you won't regret spending your time in this game.
HOWEVER; if you don't have a will made of stainless steel,
keep that in mind you'll lose your mental health and 
you'll end up raging as a result of unreasonable game issues and the toxic community of players.

This game is very fun most of the times, it does have some bugs but nothing too game breaking. It definitely is a bit scary when you're first starting out but not much after like 20 or so hours of playing it. This game is better to play with friends because in solo-queue you have no comms but in high ranks, solo queuing is fine since most people know what they are doing. I would surely recommend this game to you.
Great visual design and graphics. Poorly blalanced gameplay.

I'm just gonna get straight to the point of this review. This game is one-sided towards the killer and it has only gotten worse with more perks added. Just going to list what each has and at this time I can't recommend the game. If you have it and want to play go ahead but if not then stay away until proper balance comes to play. 

Killers have:

-Speed advantage(bloodlust included)
-Huge hitbox range so you will most likely get hit over pallets or windows even after making over. There is no indication or visual effect of the actual weapon model touching you and the game will register the hit regardless.
-A majority of better perks than survivors that counter almost every type of play
-Better addons and offerings
-Totems which give extra effects and promotes camping the totem most of the time
-Can camp or face camp anyone without penalty(Reporting for bad sportsmanship doesn't work, what a joke system that needs to be removed)
-Can tunnel and slug every survivor without any penalty and there is no counter for this for survivors(Only one perk could but you will go down regardless)
-Has doors now that only killers can break down
-Ranged killers can throw over pallets and at most times even hit you through walls. There is no counter at this time to ranged killers
-Can close the hatch now forcing the last person to the exit gate which again your gonna get caught
-Killers can see your profile but as a survivor you can't see theirs. Private profiles stops this but they can bypass it(No excuse should not be allowed for both)
-More unique killers whereas with survivors they all feel the same with barely any uniqueness to them. Shorter characters should be a bit more faster for example, ect...


Survivors have:

-4 players in game(If SWF, they can use discord to speak which can be a big advantage but depends on whether the killer is toxic or the SWF are being toxic)
-Mediocre perks, only Dead Hard, Adrenaline, Sprint Burst, Iron Will, Borrowed Time, Windows of Opportunity, and DS seem to be great perks but they all have heavy penalties. Exhaust takes way too long to recover and your most likely going to need to run to keep distance from the killer. However exhaust wont go down unless you walk.
-Flashlight which takes more time to blind killers, even at highest rarity.
-Med kit that can/used to insta heal but now just heals which is fine.
-Toolbox although some addons like brand new parts which used to insta finish a gen are no longer available
-Pallets which in some maps can help get distance or loop but can easily be avoided by blinkers and projectile killers
-360 however you will most likely get hit as this wont work 90% of the time due to killers hitbox range and speed boost
-Various walls to avoid the killer but most of them are small and again you'll get caught

I know the majority may laugh but this game isn't fun anymore. A lot of amazing people have left because the lack of proper balance for both. I played this game from the beginning and stopped for a long time only to return in hopes that theres a better balance. Survivors need better ways to counter certain killers or better options for mobility because 360's wont work. I would give this a proper review but for now I'll leave this as is unless something improves. Camping needs to be addressed the most out of all this since it just promotes toxicity and theres no reason to camp, even if getting blinded by the flashlight. Its an item being used to keep the killer at bay and is one of the only defenses a survivor has.
